items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t understand why Mary wasn\'t very good at cooking.
Tom changed his mind about going out with Mary and stayed home.
Tom checked into a small hotel and stayed for a couple of days.
Tom convinced the teacher to let him hand in his homework late.
Tom could do nothing but watch Mary being swept down the river.
Tom could think of no reason why he should give Mary any money.
It took more than a month to get over my cold, but I\'m OK now.
It\'s too late to shut the barn door after the horse is stolen.
Tom realized Mary was probably not going to be able to do that.
Tom realized it was useless to try to convince Mary to do that.
